markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Aim-Aiding](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1828)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 12 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 225 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** etched onto armor

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Armor etched with this rune aids in routing ranged attacks aimed at an enemy around you. You don't provide enemies [cover](/Rules.aspx?ID=459) against your allies' ranged attacks.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Aim-Aiding
